column10: Tax Rate of 6% applied to all products.
goBILDA Products: Assumes you have the FTC discount (25%) and an average shipping rate of 10$ (added to grand total).
REV Robotics Products: Assumes an average shipping rate of 20$ (added to grand total).
"Quantity" is the amount used in the project, not the number purchased. Differing amounts can be seen in "Comments".
Does not include tools required for manufacturing or assembly.
